name: Vegan Pudding
description: This creamy, rich, and decadent Vegan Pudding is a 1 pot recipe made with 7 pantry-staple ingredients. Itâ€™s the perfect after school snack or kid-friendly dessert!

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pot, add the sugar, cocoa, cornstarch and salt. Whisk to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pot, add the sugar, cocoa, cornstarch and salt. Whisk to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn the heat to medium heat. Slowly stir in the milk, whisking well to remove all clumps.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn the heat to medium heat. Slowly stir in the milk, whisking well to remove all clumps.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the mixture to a simmer. Once simmering, stir constantly for 2 minutes, until the pudding thickens somewhat. It won't be quite as firm as pudding yet, as it will thicken up as it chills.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring the mixture to a simmer. Once simmering, stir constantly for 2 minutes, until the pudding thickens somewhat. It won't be quite as firm as pudding yet, as it will thicken up as it chills.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat. Stir in the vegan butter, vanilla and espresso powder, if using, until the butter has melted and the pudding is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from heat. Stir in the vegan butter, vanilla and espresso powder, if using, until the butter has melted and the pudding is smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour or spoon the pudding into a container (or multiple containers.) Place a piece of plastic wrap directly on top of the pudding, to prevent a skin from forming as it chills.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour or spoon the pudding into a container (or multiple containers.) Place a piece of plastic wrap directly on top of the pudding, to prevent a skin from forming as it chills.

recipeInstructions.text: Place in the refrigerator to chill for a few hours until cold. Serve with optional vegan whipped cream/coconut cream and perhaps some mini chocolate chips.
